      • isScreenBrightnessModeAuto

        public static boolean isScreenBrightnessModeAuto(android.content.Context context)
        是否自动调节亮度模式 Judge screen brightness mode is auto mode，must declare the Manifest.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS permission in its manifest.
        参数:
        context -
        返回:
        true:auto;false: manual;default:true

        参数:
        context -
        返回:
        brightness:0-255; default:255

        public static boolean setScreenBrightness(android.content.Context context,

        参数:

        返回:

                                                  int screenBrightness)
        设置屏幕亮度，并应用到activity窗体上 Set screen brightness and change system brightness, must declare the Manifest.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS permission in its manifest.
        参数:
        activity -
        screenBrightness - 0-255
        返回:

        参数:
        context -
        返回:
        dormantTime:ms, default:30s
